jobs_results.title: Business Analyst / Scrum Master
jobs_results.description:
Requirements Elicitation

✓ Works with business partner to elicit high-level requirements and capture business needs
✓ Articulates and documents business requirements
✓ Assesses the risks of various solutions and prioritizes competing business demands
✓ Manages ongoing relationship with business partner to drive satisfaction with IT
✓ Coordinates project delivery by participating in design reviews and walk-through to communicate systems designs and validate proposed solutions
✓ Obtains key inputs from enterprise architecture teams and identifies solution interdependencies
✓ Engages with knowledge workers to incorporate usability and user interface needs when designing systems
✓ Proactively resolves customer satisfaction issues
✓ Negotiates contracts, manages relationships, and monitors vendor performance against SLAs
✓ Document and review data related requirements for the project to ensure its alignment with the project deliveries
✓ Utilizing Excel, VBA and other tools (Teradata... Studio), dive into the available data to produce insights
✓ Development, validation, publishing, and maintenance of logical and physical data models
✓ Being able to work in stressful situation when insights in (new) data sets is required quickly
✓ Experience and knowledge of agile methodologies and framework

Testing Skills

✓ Supporting in drafting test cases and scenario
✓ Supporting in populating test data to facilitate SIT and UAT
✓ Supporting in fixing data bugs
✓ Supporting in improving data uplifting to improve data quality
Education and Skills
✓ Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
✓ Demonstrable experience of Scrum Management
✓ Broad IT domain experience in three or more of the following areas IT areas: Applications Development, Enterprise
✓ Architecture, Project Management, Vendor Management, Quality Assurance, Infrastructure, and Maintenance and Support
✓ Bachelor’s degree in any field
✓ Advanced degrees are preferred
✓ Demonstrated ability to communicate in both verbal and written communication
✓ Demonstrated analytical skills
✓ Basic understanding of information technology and business concepts
✓ Familiarity with general business functions
✓ Problem solving and strong communication skills
✓ JIRA/Confluence experience

jobs_results.title: CMI - Sales - Data - Omega - Support Analyst - Intermediate 870
jobs_results.description:
Key Responsibilities
• Working within the team responsible for the delivery and support of IT services to the relevant Capital Markets Products Line ( Rate, FX, Treasury, Credit and Derivatives etc).
• Providing 1st and 2nd line support.
• Assist to implement business requests on Sales perimeter
• Coordinate with overseas IT teams for projects and system implementations
• Shift work is required

Specific systems within FO Booking and Risk is responsible for are: - (non-exhaustive list)
• OMEGA
• CMI REPORTING \ FMD \ SPOT FIRE
• ORECA
• GMD SALES ToolBox \ EOS
• Ensure correct calculation of Volume Credit and Markup
• Ensure platforms admin in relation with system providers, both internal and external.
• Dealing with STP (straight through processing) issues.
• Work within the 24x7 ‘follow the sun’ set up.
• Conform to all internal policies and procedures.
• Manage customer relations when dealing directly with both internal and external users of the systems.
• Assist members of team... (business or technical analysts)
• Liaise with users and developers.
• Assisting in the completion and timely delivery of projects
• Testing, including writing test scripts, for new releases.
• Assist the tracking of both time and resources on the projects.
• Documentation

Qualifications and Profile

An ideal Candidate should have
• Minimum 3 years of industry working experience, preferable in financial/banking industry
• Solid experience with UNIX scripting and SQL (Sybase)
• Good understanding of IT and market knowledge
• Good trouble shooting skills and be a quick learner
• Knowledge on financial products and market operations.
• Knowledge of monitoring solution (E.g OMI, ITRS Geneos)
• Good knowledge Microsoft Office
• Careful observance of standards and process
• Proactive, independent and proven ability to work under tight target and pressure
• Candidates should have ITL certification (advantage).

Interested applicants, please email your resume to Shaun Quek Yew Meng

Email: [Confidential Information]

CEI Reg No: R1660732

EA Licence No: 99C4599

jobs_results.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
jobs_results.description: • Strong experience in business analysis and requirements gathering and documentation.• Experience working on digital transformation projects, and with the digital marketing ecosystem.• Good analytical skills • Knowledge of data warehouse modeling and business intelligence concepts & in handling data process via various methods: ETL, Query, SQL. Fluent in coding language is a plus• Certification on any BI tools is preferred (DOMO, Power BI, Tableau & etc)• Interact with diverse group of stakeholders• Fluent in both written and spoken English.• Work directly with business users and stakeholders to understand the business needs and translate business requirements into detailed requirements documentation and able to communicate seamlessly between the business and the back end IT team,• Interacts regularly with senior management level stakeholders to provide periodical project status updates, raise risks and issues encountered in the project.• Coordinate with IT team.• Employ best... practices during requirements gathering and documentation stages

jobs_results.title: Planning & Performance Management Analyst
jobs_results.description:
• Work for one of the world’s largest oil and gas companies
• Diverse working environment and great benefits
• Location: Dhahran, Saudi Arabia

The Company

The company is a leading producer of energy and chemicals worldwide that has strong and proven upstream capabilities complemented by an integrated global downstream network. The company employs high-performing employees drawn by challenging and rewarding opportunity to improve lives. To continuously support their mission in the global community, the company is now looking to appoint a seasoned Planning & Performance Management Analyst to join the Downstream Finance, Planning and Performance Management Department.

The Position

The Senior Planning & Performance Management Analyst primary role is to support the management of business product lines and their consolidation into the business results. The analyst will also look to identify opportunities to improve business performance (i.e., performance management rather than just... reporting) and share these with the business with the aim of implementation.

The successful candidate will be required to plan, execute and lead planning and performance management analytical activities under the broad guidance of managers and supervisors, particularly in resolving complex, cross-functional, non-routine and/or design issues. He/She will develop and maintain close partnerships with business/operational counterparts of the organization in his/her assigned areas, and represent the organization in cross-functional, cross-organizational teams involved in performance management related tasks.

The Person

The successful candidate must have a Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Business, Engineering, or a related discipline. Possession of an advanced business degree (e.g., MBA) and/or relevant professional certification (e.g., CMA, CFA, and CPA) is preferred. He/She should have more than 12 years of related experience and strong track record in Chemicals or Refining business functions . A demonstrated capability in the practice of planning and performance management, and in the use of business intelligence tools is also essential. This includes Performance analysis, assessment and reporting, Financial (IFRS) reporting, Business planning/budgeting, Financial modelling and ability to manage, and analyze large volumes of data.

#LI-WY1

jobs_results.title: IT Business Analyst (Regulatory Reporting)
Analyst, Trade Services
jobs_results.description:
Asia & Oceania Operation Platform Department - Trade Services

Overview of Division/Department

Our Trade Services (TRS), a member of our Asia & Oceania Administration Department, is responsible for handling all trade related transactions which includes checking of documentary credits/collections, invoice financing relating to goods and services, freight financing, trust receipt etc.

Company Profile
Mizuho Bank, Ltd. is a subsidiary of the Japan-based Mizuho Financial Group, Inc. (listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and NYSE) and is one of the largest financial services companies in the world. Mizuho Bank, Ltd. provides financial and strategic solutions for the increasingly diverse and sophisticated needs of its clients with offices located in all the major cities of the world such as Tokyo, New York, London, Hong Kong and Singapore.

Job Responsibilities
Your key roles & responsibilities include:

• Processing of daily trade related transactions (Letter of Credit (L/C) collections... including payment)
• L/C confirmation, bills discounting
• Checking of Import and Export documents
• Corresponding with internal and external parties on trade related matters
• Preparing reports for management, local authorities and head office

Job Requirements
What you should have:
• A Bachelor Degree with keen interest in banking back office trade operations
• Meticulous and ability to multi-task are attributes that will help the candidate perform successfully in this role
• Additional professional qualification of Certified Documentary Credit Specialist (CDCS) will be a bonus

Join Mizuho Bank, Ltd., in Singapore, and be part of our expanding team, passionate to build the future together. "One MIZUHO: Building the future with you

jobs_results.title: Graduate Technology Associate Programme - Support Analyst - Risk & Finance IT - Intake JUN/JUL 2021
jobs_results.description:
Crédit Agricole Corporate & Investment Bank (“CA-CIB”) Graduate Technology Associate Programme is an exciting career gateway into the financial services sector. We are seeking highly motivated graduates and aspiring tech-innovators to offer an accelerated induction experience and fast-tracked career in the banking industry.

Main Responsibilities

The Risk and Finance IT (RFI) department is responsible for the development and maintenance of Compliance, Referentials, Counterparty/Credit Risks and Finance applications used by worldwide users.

As a Support Analyst within the RFI team, you will be put in-charge of handling IT support activities, while ensuring the good execution of business processes.

Having to work with business users, software engineers and fellow counterparts in Crédit Agricole CIB Paris, it is vital to uphold clear and effective communication to ensure accurate delivery of product solutions to business’ needs.

You will provide insights and recommendations based on... your understanding of support knowledge in applications dealing with domains such as Credit & Counterparty Risk, Compliance and Client Onboarding / KYC.

Scope of Work

· Understand the business environment of Credit and Counterparty Risks, Compliance and Client Onboarding/KYC and their related user business processes.

· Understand the key concepts and methods of support functions within Crédit Agricole CIB.

· Control and maintain healthy environment for the applications within scope.

· Provide Support Level 1 and Level 2 support with adequate quality of service.

· Propose Continuous Improvements to better ensure Business Users operational efficiency

· Be in the forefront of communications with business users and any stakeholder involved.

Business User Support

· Interpret user requests and incidents,

· Identify solutions and potential unwanted effects.

· Use experience to resolve user requests and incidents.

· Tracks all incidents and problems encountered.

Change Support

· Take note of the releases and knows how to find the necessary information concerning its deliveries / evolutions.

· Manage the day-to-day operational requirements, avoiding service disruptions and meeting the defined/agreed SLA's.

Incident and Problem Management

· Resolve incidents and problems by minimizing downtime, using expert knowledge to identify or prevent failures when needed.

· Propose sustainable and transposable solutions.

Information and Knowledge Management

· Complete the knowledge base and is able to communicate with Crédit Agricole CIB tools.

· Establish a predefined information structure for the use and dissemination of consistent and up-to-date information.

Stakeholder management

· Through regular communication, establishes and maintains constructive relationships with stakeholders (business lines, customers, suppliers, contributors) and ensures that their needs are taken into account and respects the IT principles

jobs_results.title: PEGA Developer - Architect (Analyst - Manager)
jobs_results.description:
About Accenture

Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations services—all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centres. Our 506,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities. Visit us at www.accenture.com.

Accenture is an Irish-domiciled multinational professional services company that provides services in:

1) Technology

2) Strategy & Consulting

3) Interactive

4) Operations

As a Fortune Global 500 company, it has been incorporated in Dublin, Ireland since September 1, 2009. In 2019, the company reported... revenues of $43.2 billion, with more than 492,000 employees serving clients in more than 200 cities in 120 countries.

Accenture Technology combines business and industry insights with innovative technology services to transform your business. Join one of the world’s largest independent providers of technology services to grow your expertise and help clients worldwide to innovate at scale and transform their businesses. Help change how the world works and lives through technology innovation.

Job Title: PEGA Application Developer - Architect (Analyst – Manager)

Critical Success Factors:

Mandatory
• Depending on seniority, around 1-10 years in System Integrator (SI) environment (in an implementation/a development capacity, rather than sales/maintenance)
• At least 1-5 years of hands-on experience in development / architecture
• We will consider Java Developers at (Analyst – Consultant level) who are keen to make a switch to pick up PEGA

Preferred/Optional
• Experience in PEGA Rule Process Commander (PRPC)n / Care Management Framework (PEGA)
• Experience in PEGA technical and architecture with broad industry and functional knowledge
• 7.n PEGA Certification is preferred (PEGA Certified SA/SSA

jobs_results.title: Technical Lead  Business System Analyst  Developers (J2EE)
jobs_results.description:
Responsibilities

The Business System Analyst is responsible to gather, analyse and formalise user’s business requirements and processes . Lead technically for overall project implementation .
To provide application architecture design to system implemented on JavaEE environment. Gather, analyse and formalise user’s business requirements and processes, evaluate on feasibility of implementation and manage scope of project.
Develop technical design specification and translate technical design into process/program specification. Involve in the design review session.
Assist in Prepare project documentation such as Requirement Specifications/Use Case Specifications etc Adhere to project scope, update requirement traceability matrix, inform and record out-of-scope issues
To review detail technical design provided by deliveryf team.
To provide technical guidance to delivery team.
To perform code review and address coding issue affecting system performance and security..
To provide support in... system performance testing by identifying system performance bottleneck and providing performance tuning advise
To provide analysis and resolution of production system reliability and performance issue
To front customer technical engagement in technical review meetings, project management committee and project steering committee
Make changes to configurable items, which include hardware, software, documentation, etc.
Participate in Coding and Code Review. Assist in the integration testing, system testing, User Acceptance Test & implementation activities.
Provide post implementation support (including production support and service requests).Requirements

Above 7-10 years’ experience in working with Java J2EE .
Min 4 Years of experience as Technical lead for complex web & web mobile applications.
In-depth experience with MVC architecture, J2EE, Java, Webservices,RESTFul services,
Strong software development skills, good understanding of object oriented concepts & design patterns.
Self-motivated with an ability to work in cross platform technologies and to work on more than one project at a time.
Hands on experience in Angular 4/6, JQuery,JSON.
In-depth Experience with MySQL, MariaDB and Oracle databases.
In depth on Experience with Unix, Linux.
Good Experience MySQL, Maria DB ,Oracle databases. Ability to handle/Guide team on SQL tuning.
Certified in Java,J2EE.
Hands on Experience of project initialization, execution with key emphasis on Analysis, Architecture Design and Testing of the application.
Should be able to propose the solution for new project requirement, and able to present the solution to business users and end customers.
Able to do in-depth analysis and document the system requirements .
Extensive working experience in analysing requirements and executing projects related to JAVA/J2EE Technology.
Strong team player with excellent inter-personal skills.
Ability to meet deadlines with no compromise on the quality of the work product.Candidates will be offered a Permanent / Direct Contract role, based on assessment
